Soso.\""},{"lineNumber":80857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最後まで騒がしい奴らだったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They were noisy fellows until the very end.\""},{"lineNumber":80858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha...\""},{"lineNumber":80859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふっ……ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe... soso.\""},{"lineNumber":80860,"originalJapaneseLine":"笑みを漏らしたテラが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Tera, who let out a smile,"},{"lineNumber":80861,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆に向けて改めて顔を上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"lifted her face again toward everyone."},{"lineNumber":80862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来水美樹様、小川健太郎様。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki Kizumi-sama, Kentarou Ogawa-sama."},{"lineNumber":80863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　両名はホルスが責任を持って","translatedEnglishLine":"We at Horus take full responsibility for both individuals"},{"lineNumber":80864,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここに安置させて頂きます。ｿｿｿ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and will keep them here. Soso.\""},{"lineNumber":80878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No..."},{"lineNumber":80879,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても温かくて、美味しいです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s very warm and delicious...\""},{"lineNumber":80880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、ホッとするぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm, it’s comforting.\""},{"lineNumber":80881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":80882,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほんのりと甘いお茶で喉を潤し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Moistening her throat with the lightly sweet tea,"},{"lineNumber":80883,"originalJapaneseLine":"香姫がそっと息を吐く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kouki gently let out a breath."},{"lineNumber":80884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんなにリラックスしたの……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder when the last time was that I felt this relaxed..."},{"lineNumber":80885,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつ以来だったでしょう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder how long it’s been...\""},{"lineNumber":80886,"originalJapaneseLine":"とっとと茶を飲み干したランスが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance quickly finished his tea"},{"lineNumber":80887,"originalJapaneseLine":"湯飲みをカツンとテーブルに置く。","translatedEnglishLine":"and set the cup down with a clink on the table."},{"lineNumber":80888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで残る問題はグッと少なくなった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With this, the remaining problems have been greatly reduced.\""},{"lineNumber":80889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s right."},{"lineNumber":80890,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍はおそらく真っ直ぐに、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army will likely head straight,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあ皆さん、
今までどうもお世話になりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you very much for everything up till now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いっぱいご迷惑おかけしてごめんなさい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm sorry for causing you so much trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カチンコチンになってきまーす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm about to turn stone cold stiff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃっ、冷たい空気が出てきた！
美樹ちゃん、大丈夫！？」
「きゃー、寒いね寒いね健太郎くん。
ぷるぷる」
「わーっ、ぱらんぱらんになっちゃうよー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wah, I'm going to go all crumbly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出してー、たすけてー」
「ぽんぽん……」
「み、美樹ちゃ……」
「コールドスリープ、完了しました。ｿｿｿ」
「最後まで騒がしい奴らだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They were noisy fellows until the very end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは……」
「ふふっ……ｿｿｿ」
笑みを漏らしたテラが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tera, who let out a smile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆に向けて改めて顔を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: lifted her face again toward everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来水美樹様、小川健太郎様。
両名はホルスが責任を持って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We at Horus take full responsibility for both individuals

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに安置させて頂きます。ｿｿｿ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and will keep them here. Soso."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たとえ何千年でも……何万年でも……ｿｿｿ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter if it’s thousands... or tens of thousands of years... soso."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何万年……」
「魔王……
ここに、封印される、だな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is to be sealed here, isn’t he...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行は別れを惜しむように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The party, as if reluctant to part,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何をするでもなく部屋に残る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: remained in the room without doing anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして一人、また一人……
心中で別れを済ませて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: silently said their farewells in their hearts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽつぽつと部屋を出て行った。
「はーっ、終わった、終わった！」
「皆様、お疲れ様でした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everyone, thank you for your hard work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうぞ、ホルスのお茶なので、
お口に合うか分かりませんが。ｿｿｿ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know if it will suit your taste. Soso."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ……
とっても温かくて、美味しいです……」
「うむ、ホッとするぞ」
ほんのりと甘いお茶で喉を潤し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moistening her throat with the lightly sweet tea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫がそっと息を吐く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kouki gently let out a breath.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなにリラックスしたの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder when the last time was that I felt this relaxed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつ以来だったでしょう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder how long it’s been..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと茶を飲み干したランスが
湯飲みをカツンとテーブルに置く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and set the cup down with a clink on the table.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで残る問題はグッと少なくなった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this, the remaining problems have been greatly reduced."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね。
魔軍はおそらく真っ直ぐに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army will likely head straight,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
